title: Tabbouleh Salad
directions: In saucepan, bring 1-3/4 cups (425 mL) water to boil; stir in bulgur. Reduce heat to low; cover and cook for 10 minutes or until no liquid remains. Transfer to large bowl, fluffing with fork. Let cool to room temperature.
Add chickpeas, tomatoes, cucumber, parsley, onions and mint.
Dressing: In small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, oil, garlic, salt and pepper; pour over bulgur mixture and toss to combine.
Substitution: Use 1 lb (500 g) peeled and deveined grilled large shrimp or chicken strips instead of the chickpeas.
ingredients: 1 cup (250 mL) (250 mL) medium or coarse bulgur
1 cup (250 mL) (250 mL) diced English cucumberEnglish cucumbers
1 cup (250 mL) (250 mL) minced fresh Italian parsley
1/2 cup (125 mL) (125 mL) chopped green oniongreen onions
1/4 cup (60 mL) (60 mL) chopped fresh mint
